text: Va ʙad-in guna [ki ʙa pajomʙaroni peşin kitoʙi osmonī furū firistodem] in kitoʙro [niz] ʙar tu nozil kardem, pas, kasone, ki [peş az tu] ʙa onon kitoʙ [-i osmonī] dodem, ʙa in [Qur'on niz] imon meovarand va az inon [muşrikon] kasone hastand, ki ʙa on imon meovarand va çuz kofiron [kase] ojoti Moro inkor namekunad
